title: EOLO Powers Their Ultra-Broadband Data Services Deploying SIAE MICROELETTRONICA Latest Microwave Technology
text: Wednesday, September 9, 2015 12:35PM IST (7:05AM GMT) EOLO Powers Their Ultra-Broadband Data Services Deploying SIAE MICROELETTRONICA Latest Microwave Technology Milan, Italy EOLO is a leader in offering Ultra-Broadband services to residential and enterprises in Italy. Their services run over a capillary wireless transmission network offering highest flexibility and connections up to 1Gbps per user. Their network reliability and high quality services are a differentiator that allowed EOLO to grow 30% in top line last year reaching revenues for over 43,5 Million €. EOLO was looking for a wireless solution capable of offering the highest capacity while maximizing the use of radio spectrum to expand and upgrade their current transport network. In line with their growth plans, EOLO selected SIAE MICROELETTRONICA latest microwave radio generation solutions, namely the AGS20 and ALFOplus2 to boost their network. The SIAE MICROELETTRONICA AGS20 is a split mount solution operating at 2048QAM up to four carriers, and the SIAE MICROELETTRONICA ALFOplus2 operating at 4096QAM capable of offering up to 2x112MHz channels with a total throughput of 2,5GBs making it the most advanced and highest performing full outdoor microwave radio system on the market. “EOLO is continuously covering new regions helping to close the digital divide in Italy offering the highest level of data services” Says Gianleonardo Solazzi, Radio Network Planning Manager at EOLO adding “To achieve these results we look for the best technology on the market, and as a fully Italian owned company we are proud that this technology comes for an Italian company also.” “We have been cooperating closely with NGI on several technology fronts” says Sergio Colombo Sales Account Manager in SIAE MICROELETTRONICA, adding “we are pleased that our technology is the enabler of such a successful enterprise” About SIAE MICROELETTRONICA GROUP SIAE MICROELETTRONICA, founded in 1952, is a leader in wireless communication technology. Present in over 25 countries it offers to national and multinational operators advanced technological solution for microwave and millimetre wave transport, services and design. In 2014 the group has founded SM OPTICS, a company driving innovation in fiber based communication, counting on a proven management and R&D team with 20+ years of experience in the optical domain as well as delivering comprehensive professional services. " For more information on Eolo visit: www.eolo.it
